history.title: About Casino Rama Resort
history.description2: Casino Rama Resort is a luxury casino resort in Ontario, Canada, located on the land of the Chippewas of Rama First Nation. It’s a unique destination combining gaming, relaxation, and world-class entertainment.
history.description3:
The resort features over 2,000 slot machines and 60+ table games, including blackjack, roulette, and poker. Jackpots reach up to $15,000, and slot bonuses go as high as $10,000, making it ideal for big win seekers.
Guests enjoy 289 luxury suites, a spa, saltwater pool, fitness center, and 8 restaurants offering international cuisine. The 5,000-seat entertainment center hosts concerts by global music stars.

customHtml.title: Casino Rama Resort — Gaming, Luxury, and Big Rewards in Ontario
customHtml.description:
Casino Rama Resort is a one-of-a-kind destination that blends thrilling casino action, luxurious accommodations, and world-class entertainment. Located on the scenic land of the Chippewas of Rama First Nation, the resort features over 1,800 slot machines, dozens of live dealer tables, and high-limit games including poker, roulette, and blackjack. Regular promotions offer jackpots up to $15,000 and slot bonuses reaching $10,000, making it a hotspot for big win seekers.


The hotel offers 289 luxury suites with lake views, a full-service spa, a saltwater pool, and a fitness center. Guests can dine at one of eight restaurants, including St. Germain’s Steakhouse, Couchiching Court Buffet, and venues serving Asian and Italian cuisine. Stylish bars and lounges provide cocktails and live music for evening relaxation.


The 5,000-seat entertainment center hosts global stars like Mariah Carey, Ringo Starr, and Carrie Underwood. The My Club Rewards loyalty program lets guests earn points for gaming, dining, and hotel stays, redeemable for free play, meals, concert tickets, and merchandise. Members enjoy exclusive deals, VIP events, and personalized bonuses.


Casino Rama is more than a casino — it’s a full resort experience where gaming, dining, relaxation, and entertainment come together in one unforgettable getaway.


Casino Rama Resort Visitor Rules

To enter the gaming floor at Casino Rama Resort, guests must be at least 19 years old and present valid government-issued photo ID. Those aged 21 or younger must also show a secondary ID with their name. The Entertainment Centre is open to guests 12 years and older.


  • • Dress Code: clothing must be clean, no offensive graphics; motorcycle insignia and security/police-style outfits are prohibited.
  • • Alcohol Policy: no outside alcohol in licensed areas; sealed bottles allowed in hotel rooms only.
  • • Smoking: permitted only in designated smoking areas.
  • • Entry Restrictions: intoxicated individuals, self-excluded guests, and previously banned visitors are not allowed.

My Club Rewards Loyalty Program

My Club Rewards is a multi-tiered loyalty program available at Casino Rama Resort and other Gateway Casinos locations. Membership is free — just present a valid photo ID at the My Club desk to receive your personalized card.


How to Redeem Points:

  • • Free slot play
  • • Dining credits
  • • Hotel discounts
  • • Concert and show tickets
  • • Branded merchandise and gifts

How to Earn Points:

  • • Slot and table play: points are earned based on wager volume, not wins.
  • • Dining and drinks: earn points when paying at restaurants and bars.
  • • Hotel stays: earn points for room payments.
  • • Events and promotions: bonus points during special offers.

Membership Tiers:

  • • Rewards (0–999 points) — entry-level
  • • Silver (1,000–4,999) — priority lines, free valet parking
  • • Gold (5,000–24,999) — enhanced offers, event invitations
  • • Elite (25,000–99,999) — concierge service, personalized gifts
  • • Ultra (100,000+) — VIP host, top-tier benefits

Higher tiers unlock more personalized deals, VIP access, and exclusive promotions tailored to your preferences.

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment & Gaming at Casino Rama
customHtml_2.description:
Casino Rama Resort Bonuses and Special Offers

Casino Rama offers a variety of generous promotions and bonuses that enhance both gaming and entertainment experiences. New players are welcomed with a bonus of up to $600 and 50 free spins, perfect for exploring the casino’s wide selection of games. Crypto users can enjoy a 150% bonus on their first Bitcoin deposit, giving them extra value.


Deposit match promotions allow players to receive a percentage of their deposit back as bonus funds, boosting their bankroll and extending playtime.


Slot enthusiasts can take advantage of free spins on popular machines. These offers are updated regularly and can be found in the player’s account dashboard.


Beyond gaming, Casino Rama hosts entertainment-based promotions, such as:

  • • Holiday Giftaway — festive prize giveaways
  • • Spin to Win Mondays — free spins every Monday
  • • Texas Hold’em Countdown Challenge — poker tournaments with prizes [casinorama.com]

Seasonal events, themed parties, and concerts often come with discounts or complimentary tickets for participants in gaming promotions.


Popular Games at Casino Rama Resort

Casino Rama Resort features over 1,800 slot machines and 60+ live table games, offering a mix of classic and modern experiences. Top slot titles include Wheel of Fortune®, Buffalo™, Dragon Link™, Lightning Link™, 5 Treasures™, T-Rex II, Mystic Fortune Megaways, Pirate’s Bounty, and Neon Classic Reels. These machines are known for immersive themes, bonus rounds, cascading wins, and progressive jackpots.


  • • T-Rex II delivers dinosaur-themed action with 5 reels, 25 paylines, wild features, and free spins.
  • • Mystic Fortune Megaways offers dynamic reel setups, cascading symbols, and multipliers.
  • • Pirate’s Bounty features treasure maps, stacked wilds, and chest-style jackpots.
  • • Neon Classic Reels updates retro slots with neon visuals, sticky wilds, and multipliers.

Popular table games include Blackjack, Roulette, Baccarat, and various forms of Poker such as Texas Hold’em, Caribbean Stud, Pai Gow, Three Card Poker, Mississippi Stud, and Let It Ride Bonus. High-stakes players can enjoy the High Limits Room with private tables and premium service.


Electronic versions of blackjack, baccarat, and roulette are also available, offering lower limits and user-friendly interfaces.

Minimum and Maximum Bets at Casino Rama Resort

Casino Rama offers a wide range of betting limits suitable for casual players and high rollers alike. Below is a table with current limits for popular games:


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slots (regular) from 0.01 CAD up to 100 CAD/spin
Slots (high-limit) from 1 CAD up to 100 CAD/spin
Blackjack from 25 CAD up to 5,000 CAD
Baccarat from 50 CAD up to 15,000 CAD
Roulette from 5 CAD up to 10,000 CAD
Pai Gow Poker from 25 CAD up to 2,500 CAD
Tie & Pair Bets from 25 CAD up to 3,000 CAD
Electronic Table Games (ETG) from 3 CAD up to 300 CAD

These limits allow players to manage their bankrolls effectively and choose their preferred level of risk. High-stakes options are available in the exclusive High Limits Room.


Events and Entertainment at Casino Rama Resort

Casino Rama Resort is not just a casino — it’s one of Ontario’s top entertainment destinations. Its 5,000-seat Entertainment Centre hosts weekly concerts, comedy shows, cultural festivals, and seasonal celebrations.


Concerts

The stage welcomes global stars and music legends like Sarah McLachlan, Jerry Seinfeld, Kansas, Marianas Trench, Chelsea Handler, Tony Hinchcliffe, Ron White, and Elton Rohn, along with tribute acts for Elvis Presley, The Rolling Stones, Queen, and Eagles.

Special Events

  • • Holiday Dreams — a holiday-themed show with acrobatics and lights
  • • Million Dollar Christmas Miracle — festive performance with prize giveaways
  • • The Price is Right Live — interactive game show experience
  • • Legends Show — tribute to Buddy Holly, Roy Orbison, Motown & Elvis
  • • Live UFC screenings, New Year’s Eve galas, BBQ weekends, Indigenous music showcases, and Lunar New Year festivals

Comedy Nights

Top comedians regularly perform, including Russell Peters, Steve Martin & Martin Short, Ron White, Howie Mandel, and Tony Hinchcliffe.

Event Format

Most shows are held on Fridays and Saturdays, with some daytime and family-friendly performances. Tickets are available via the Casino Rama website or Ticketmaster. Early booking is recommended for popular dates.


Relaxation, Bars and Dining at Casino Rama Resort

Casino Rama Resort offers a full resort experience with comfort, cuisine, and relaxation. The hotel features 289 luxury suites, styled like lakeside cottages, with spacious bathrooms, lounge areas, and scenic views. Guests enjoy 24-hour room service, access to a heated indoor saltwater pool, dry sauna, eucalyptus steam room, and a fully equipped fitness center.


Dining options include 8 restaurants and bars, such as:

  • • St. Germain’s Steakhouse — premium steaks and fine wines
  • • Couchiching Court Buffet — international buffet selections
  • • Simcoe Yard House — sports bar with beer and snacks
  • • The Willow — Asian cuisine
  • • Cedar — café with light meals and desserts
  • • The Noodle Bar — Eastern noodle dishes
  • • Centre Bar — cocktails and drinks in the heart of the casino
  • • Dream Catcher Lounge — live music and lounge snacks

Relaxation at Casino Rama goes beyond gaming. After a day of excitement, guests can unwind with spa treatments, swim in the pool, or enjoy live music in the lounge. The resort is perfect for both gaming enthusiasts and those seeking a peaceful, luxurious escape.

items.title: Do I need to register before visiting?
items.answer: No registration is required, but it's recommended for promotions.

items.title: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: Cash, credit/debit cards, and internal gaming account top-ups.

items.title: What languages are available for service?
items.answer: English is primary; French and other languages available upon request.

items.title: What are the minimum betting limits?
items.answer: Slots from 0.01 CAD; table games from 5–25 CAD.

items.title: Is parking available for guests?
items.answer: Yes, free parking is available for all visitors.
